title: Ranked win counts as loss due to game error
body:
Just now i played a game where it ended about 7 minutes after i somehow got dced.

I didn't care that my team won, but what i cared about was how i got dced.

My game crashed including the client and when i tried to login i couldn't, then i got this message.
"Your game was reverted to a previous version, please restart the game to update.."

In the end i had to download a crapton of updates and when i finished the game was long over and i lost LP. :/

Anyone know whats up? I don't want this to happen again in the future.

replies.body: Eep! It sounds like your client ran into some damaged game files, and noticed that you were going to keep crashing if the client didn't do something about it. In order to make sure you didn't keep crashing over and over, the client reverted to a previous patch so that it could re-download the latest patch successfully. At this point, your probably safe to let those updates finish. If you want to double check, you could download our #[**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a force repatch just in case.

I repaired it more than twice and it's still happening.

It happened to my last 2 games in which i was able to reconnect in time, but my most recent (5/23) wasn't so lucky as i had to wait a longwhile as i  recieved a loss  when my team won.
